entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
